text: The President further said that all the investments as well as the contributions to the education of the children is a great service towards the future of the country.He made these remarks addressing a ceremony organized to grant scholarships to children of low-income families held at the Presidents House, yesterday (4th July).These scholarships were presented to 500 children under the sponsorship of the Dinesh Weerakkody Foundation.President Maithripala Sirisena says the education is a very important tool for the future of the country as well as it builds a complete man.
